order.title: Presentation order
order.description: Presentation order of the top site.

exclude_locales.title: Exclude locales
exclude_locales.description: List of locales to exclude (BCP 47 format, eg. "de-AT", "fr-CA").

include_locales.title: Include locales
include_locales.description: List of locales to include (BCP 47 format, eg. "de-AT", "fr-CA"). Set none to include all.

include_regions.title: Include regions
include_regions.description: List of regions to include (eg. "FR", "CN"). Set none to include all.

search_shortcut.title: Search shortcut
search_shortcut.description: Make the top site a search shortcut rather than a direct link.

sponsored_tile_id.title: Sponsored tile ID
sponsored_tile_id.description: The tile ID of the sponsored top site.

sponsored_position.title: Sponsored position
sponsored_position.description: Lock this top site at the specified position (1-based, 0 disables this feature).

exclude_experiments.title: Exclude for experiments
exclude_experiments.description: Exclude this top site if `browser.topsites.experiment.${experimentID}` == true for _any_ of the specified experiment IDs.

include_experiments.title: Include for experiments
include_experiments.description: Include this top site _only_ if `browser.topsites.experiment.${experimentID}` == true for _any_ of the specified experiment IDs.

sponsored_click_url.title: Sponsored click URL
sponsored_click_url.description: The click URL of the sponsored top site.

url_urlbar_override.title: urlbar-specific URL
url_urlbar_override.description: urlbar-specific URL of the top site.

send_attribution_request.title: Send attribution request
send_attribution_request.description: Send attribution request to Mozilla server. Typically used together with sponsored_position.

sponsored_impression_url.title: Sponsored impression URL
sponsored_impression_url.description: The impression URL of the sponsored top site.

schema.description: Top sites to display by default on the new tab page and in the address bar.
